reference.title: Collect Log Files dialog
reference.shortdesc: Using this dialog you can collect Eclipse and MOTODEV Studio log files and package them into a single ZIP archive.

section.p: This dialog appears when you select Collect Log Files from the Help menu.

strow.stentry: The directory into which the ZIP archive containing the log files should be written.
The name to be used for the archive file, minus the extension. An extension of .zip will be added when the archive is created.
The path and filename for the archive file. Because this is a ZIP archive, you may want to give the filename a .zip extension.
A list of files that are eligible to be archived. Only those files that are selected will be archived.
